column1: The '''Free Fair''' was a festival that the [[Hobbits]] held during the three days of [[Lithedays
column2: Lithe]]. It took place in the [[White Downs]] near [[Michel Delving]] and among the attractions was the election of the [[Mayor of Michel Delving]] held every seven years. It was called 'Free' because anyone could set up a stall without charge.<ref>{{FR
1420}} [[Frodo Baggins]] resigned as Deputy Mayor and [[Will Whitfoot]] returned to office for seven years.<ref>{{RK
column5: n}} Will Whitfoot resigned and [[Samwise Gamgee]] was elected Mayor, beginning the first of seven terms in office.<ref>{{App
